Alternative Chain Rule Proof Christian Jones: University of Bath March 2023 Introduction Here is an alternative proof of the chain rule which uses the \(\epsilon\)-\(\delta\) definition of the limit. It’s quite involved, but its a great example if you want more practice with these types of arguments. The typed version here is based off of one presented by Adrian Hill, who previously lectured this course.
